title: 3:16 Carnage Amongst The Stars (Custom System Builder)
description:
Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline-fueled sci-fi experience! This high-octane role-playing game throws you and your fellow Space Troopers into the heat of battle, blasting bugs to bits across the galaxy! Climb the ranks, upgrade your arsenal, and obliterate entire civilizations, all while uncovering your past through the game’s innovative “Flashback” mechanic!

Terra has only one goal: wipe out every living thing in the universe to keep the home world safe. Where will your tour with the ruthless 3:16th Expeditionary Force take you? Dive headfirst into a campaign of brutal action, explosive missions, and unapologetic Carnage Amongst The Stars!

Pick up your copy of it here: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/56768/three-sixteen


This lightweight module comes with everything you need to get started, including a special bonus: The Hokusai Campaign. Battle ferocious, acid spitting jellyfish on a gorgeous, biolumienscent planet.
